title: Is it possible to unlock the screen by opening the case on Pixel 4a
content:
Samsung phones and tablets tend to have a feature that allows them to unlock the screen when opening a flip case or just open the lock screen when you have any password, pin, fingerprint or whatever set up. 
Is this feature present it Google Pixel 4a? 
(I believe they do it with magnets, but there are other ways to achieve this)
